name: hoogo
0:
”Alexa, ask hoogo robot to begin cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask hoogo robot to stop cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask hoogo robot to start charging.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hoogo robot
des:
Your hoogo robot vacuum can interact with Amazon Alexa and be monitored and controlled by voice command.
To get started, you need to link your hoo go to your app account.
Once linked, you can control your robot with voice commands.
 For instance, you can try the below voice commands:
Alexa, ask hoogo robot to begin cleaning.
Alexa, ask hoogo robot to stop cleaning.
Alexa, ask hoogo robot to start charging.
